alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central DeKalb, northwestern Gwinnett and east central Fulton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Peachtree Corners. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Peachtree Corners, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Dunwoody, Duluth, Suwanee, Lilburn, Norcross, Doraville, Berkeley Lake, Tucker, and Mechanicsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
